about_the_game:
The official soundtrack to Tower Song, available in MP3 and high quality lossless WAV!

  • Contains all 10 original tracks from the game

The eerie Tower Song haunts the dreams of all who live in the Tower's shade, and now you can fill your own mind palace with its haunting melodies. This original score ranges from upbeat battle beats to mournful dungeon themes.

Note:

The Tower Song soundtrack will be updated as additional content for the game is released. The soundtrack will update on Steam and you will get the new songs automatically if you own the Tower Song soundtrack.

name: Tower Song Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 53 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 339 MB available space

short_description: This is additional content for Tower Song, but does not include the base game.
